basic.description: This course provides the application component of NUR 3056. Under the guidance of lab instructors, the student is given opportunities to integrate theoretical knowledge from NUR 3056 in practice sessions. Demonstration; low, medium, and high fidelity simulation scenarios; deliberate practice methods; debriefing; and reflective instructional approaches are used.
basic.subject: NUR
basic.title: Foundations of Nursing Practice Lab

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: Admission to the Nursing major. Corequisite: Semester I Nursing courses.
